enabled.description: True to enable Cachito support. Default value: false

flags.description: List of flags to pass to Cachito. See https://github.com/release-engineering/cachito

packages.description: A map of package managers where each value is an array of maps describing custom behavior for the packages of that package manager. See https://osbs.readthedocs.io/en/osbs_ocp3/users.html#remote-source-keys
